alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:25PM CDT until May 12 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CLAY...SOUTHERN HUBBARD...NORTHERN WADENA...SOUTHERN NORMAN...SOUTHERN MAHNOMEN...BECKER...SOUTHERN CLEARWATER... NORTHEASTERN CASS AND SOUTHEASTERN TRAILL COUNTIES... At 825 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harwood to near Huntersville, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Park Rapids, Hawley, Ada, Menahga, Twin Valley and Lake Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 69 and 100. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central and northwestern Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Clay; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Wadena
